name: CatchMe Jump
description:
CatchMe Jump is a fun couch-coop game with focus on social gaming.

Play 15+ different maps directly in the browser with friends! 

Rules are simple: watch out for the player with the red thingy - he is the catcher. And vice-versa: if you are the catcher, try to catch other players as fast as possible.

Controls

Use Controllerly to control your character with a gamepad on the smartphone and unlock the full local multiplayer experience. The connection code is shown on the main screen!

You may also add keyboard controls by clicking on the input device fields. The key mappings are as follows (jump, left, right, speed boost): (1) W,A,D,E - (2) ARROW KEYS, Space  - (3) U,H,K,I

With the speed boost you get 1.5 seconds increased speed and jumping power! Activate the speed boost to jump and run faster.

Scoring

If you possess the yellow star you gain extra points. If not, jump onto the head of the player with the yellow star to steal it!

Scores are shown in the top left. All players, except for the catcher, earn 1 point per second. The player with the star earns 1.5 points per second :)

Happy gaming.

Marco
